title: How was your PESSAT?
content: Ok I know that majority of you guys wouldn't have attempted PESSAT yet because of JEe but I was wondering how it went for the people who have taken it. My test went probably average at best and i could pretty confidently say the same for most of the other people in my time slot(some of them finishing the whole test in an hour, 180 qs btw haha.) Surprisingly it was much harder than expected especially the fill in the blanks questions in math. Would be great if other candidates could share their experience:)

comments.body: Can I have the QP ðŸ˜…
Would you say the questions are similar to JEE level or more like CET/COMEDK?
Sadly it's a computer based test:(
Oh, shame btw how was the portion split between 11th and 12th grade? 50-50?
They're around the CET level with a bonus of 20 English questions( doesn't matter as everyone's practically gonna get close to full in the English section as the questions are like 8th grade level)
Afaik they've tried their best to make it an exact 50-50 split.
Were the questions equally distributed in Physics and Chem?... Or were there more from some specific chapters
